item.title: Bondi Beach Shooting - Latest news and headlines from Australia and the world
item.description: At least 16 people are confirmed dead after a mass shooting at Sydney's Bondi Beach that targeted a Hanukkah celebration and has been deemed a terrorist attack. 9News brings you the latest coverage.

item.title: What we know about the alleged Bondi Beach gunmen
item.description: <p>T﻿he father and son duo allegedly lied about their whereabouts in the leadup to the shooting, according to family.</p>

item.title: Bondi hero would 'do it again' despite being 'riddled with bullets'
item.description: Incredible footage that emerged on Sunday night showed Sydney father-of-two Ahmed el Ahmed creeping up on o...

item.title: Two police officers among dozens injured in Bondi shooting, 12 remain critical
item.description: <p>NSW Health says 26 patients were still in hospitals across Sydney, including 12 in a critical condition.</p>

item.title: 'Simple but powerful message': Opera House lit up, tributes grow at Bondi Beach after terror attack
item.description: <p>The Sydney Opera House has been lit up in a &quot;simple but powerful&quot; message to the world in the wake of the Bondi Beach terror attack that targeted a Jewish celebration for the first day of Hanukkah.</p>

item.title: Australian National Weather Forecast
item.description: National weather forecast for Australia including capital city temperatures, rain radar maps, satellite images, synoptic chart, and weather warnings

item.title: Thousands gather to mourn Bondi terror victims
